author: mseidel42
body:
#### PR description:

Needs https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/9612

Pythia 8.313 requires
* `ParticleDecays:allowPhotonRadiation` -> `HadronLevel:QED`
* `Tune:preferLHAPDF = 0` when an internal Pythia PDF is used

#### PR validation:

```
Pass    3s ... GeneratorInterface/Pythia8Interface/TestGeneratorInterfacePythia8InterfaceCompareIdentical
Pass    5s ... GeneratorInterface/Pythia8Interface/TestGeneratorInterfacePythia8InterfaceCompareExternal
Pass   10s ... GeneratorInterface/Pythia8Interface/TestGeneratorInterfacePythia8InterfaceCompareExternalStreams
Pass   12s ... GeneratorInterface/Pythia8Interface/testGeneratorInterfacePythia8InterfaceTP
Pass   18s ... GeneratorInterface/EvtGenInterface/TestGeneratorInterfaceEvtGenInterface_bplus
Pass   20s ... GeneratorInterface/EvtGenInterface/TestGeneratorInterfaceEvtGenInterface_external_bplus
Pass   28s ... GeneratorInterface/Pythia8Interface/TestGeneratorInterfacePythia8ConcurrentGeneratorFilter
Pass   46s ... GeneratorInterface/EvtGenInterface/GeneratorInterfaceEvtGenInterfaceTest
>> Test sequence completed for CMSSW CMSSW_15_0_0_pre1   
```
title: Modifications for Pythia 8.313
